buttons

Class TextButton1

  • java.lang.Object
    • buttons.Button1
      • buttons.TextButton1

  • public class TextButton1
extends Button1
    Subclass of Button1. Represents a button with text inside it, with adjusted characteristics compared to TextButton for personal preference of some coders.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Creates a new TextButton1 object with the following parameters.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TextButton1

        public TextButton1(float x,
                   float y,
                   float width,
                   float height,
                   float textX,
                   float textY,
                   int btnR,
                   int btnG,
                   int btnB,
                   int textR,
                   int textG,
                   int textB,
                   java.lang.String text)
        Creates a new TextButton1 object with the following parameters.
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate of the button
        y - the y-coordinate of the button
        width - the width of the button
        height - the height of the button
        textX - the x-coordinate of the button's text
        textY - the y-coordinate of the button's text
        btnR - the red value of the button's color
        btnG - the green value of the button's color
        btnB - the blue value of the button's color
        textR - the red value of the text's color
        textG - the green value of the text's color
        textB - the blue value of the text's color
        text - the text to be displayed inside the button

      • isInBounds

        public boolean isInBounds(int mouseX,
                          int mouseY)
        Parameters:
        mouseX - the x-coordinate of the point
        mouseY - the y-coordinate of the point
        Returns:
        true if the point (mouseX, mouseY) is inside the button, otherwise false
